name: Mystic Shackle
duration: Prolonged (this spell uses the advanced prolongation factors)
effect: The mage curses an item so that it penalizes the use of one or more Arcana.

rotes.roteDescription: Followers of the Silver Ladder who commit offenses against their leaders are sometimes, as a punishment short of expulsion or death, fitted temporarily with Weighty Anchors. Few who undergo this indignity are foolish enough to repeat their transgressions.
